ComicInfo.Summary: Forget everything you THINK you know about the world of the Gear Station... Our heroes managed to finally repair the Gear Station and defeat the evil Drach Domo, but their adventure is just beginning. Now they must harness the machine's vast power to travel back in time to its very creation! Witness the world of Gear Station Prime, a dark, gothic land where technology and science reign while Majic and spirituality are outlawed. The Arcadian Wars are just on the horizon; the Dusk Mages are beginning to gather their power while they plot their return to the Pantheon of Life. Our Majic- wielding heroes are totally out of place here--and there not the only ones! An evil force has gone back in time as well, in hopes of destroying the Gear Station before itt's even built. Who is this evil force?? How does he plan to unite the Dark Mages? And just where does the Dominion of Souls figure into all of this?
